3: What's wrong, Father?
I heard you have been giving away your food to others, Bianca...
Here are some food, Bianca...
Father Snow, didn't you also give all your food to the children?
Th-that's not the same. I've already eaten.
Father, I have a question. What has God taught us?
God taught us to...
Be holy, righteous, loving, giving; to love the enemy, fast, pray; to walk in the light, to not be greedy, not to judge; to be sincere and to stay on the path.
Fasting.
Under God's and your teaching, I'm also a pious believer.
All I have done is to obey God's teaching.
Bianca... My children.
Now, if I'm not a pious Father...
Am I qualified... as a parent...
Eat, my children, my silly children.
Of course you are! You raised and taught me, Father... I understand.
...People are starting to gather around the Snow Plain Church in the Arctic north.
People seek shelter, and no matter their beliefs...
As long as they need help, we will help. That is also one of your teachings.
How long has it been since Miyi went to town to get food? A few days?
... It's been three days.
Father... Is there anything we can do?
Pray... We can only pray to God.
Let us pray... We can only pray that God will bless us in this faraway Snow Plain Church, to help the people...
God loves the world, Bianca.
